verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> For behold the day בָּ֔א <WH935> cometh בֹּעֵ֖ר <WH1197> that shall burn כַּתַּנּ֑וּר <WH8574> as an oven וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> become כָל־ <WH3605> and all זֵדִ֜ים <WH2086> and all the proud וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every עֹשֵׂ֤ה <WH6213> yea and all that do רִשְׁעָה֙ <WH7564> wickedly קַ֔שׁ <WH7179> shall be stubble וְלִהַ֨ט <WH3857> shall burn them up אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> and the day הַבָּ֗א <WH935> that cometh אָמַר֙ <WH559> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> so לֹא־ <WH3808> neither יַעֲזֹ֥ב <WH5800> that it shall leave לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like שֹׁ֥רֶשׁ <WH8328> them neither root וְעָנָֽף׃ <WH6057> nor branch

וְזָרְחָ֨ה <WH2224> arise לָכֶ֜ם יִרְאֵ֤י <WH3373> But unto you that fear שְׁמִי֙ <WH8034> my name שֶׁ֣מֶשׁ <WH8121> shall the Sun צְדָקָ֔ה <WH6666> of righteousness וּמַרְפֵּ֖א <WH4832> with healing בִּכְנָפֶ֑יהָ <WH3671> in his wings וִֽיצָאתֶ֥ם <WH3318> and ye shall go forth וּפִשְׁתֶּ֖ם <WH6335> and grow up כְּעֶגְלֵ֥י <WH5695> as calves מַרְבֵּֽק׃ <WH4770> of the stall

וְעַסּוֹתֶ֣ם <WH6072> And ye shall tread down רְשָׁעִ֔ים <WH7563> the wicked כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become אֵ֔פֶר <WH665> for they shall be ashes תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under כַּפּ֣וֹת <WH3709> under the soles רַגְלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH7272> of your feet בַּיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> in the day אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am עֹשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> that I shall do אָמַ֖ר <WH559> [this] saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts פ

זִכְר֕וּ <WH2142> Remember תּוֹרַ֖ת <WH8451> ye the law מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> of Moses עַבְדִּ֑י <WH5650> my servant אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which צִוִּ֨יתִי <WH6680> which I commanded אוֹת֤וֹ <WH853> בְחֹרֵב֙ <WH2722> unto him in Horeb עַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> for all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> for all Israel חֻקִּ֖ים <WH2706> [with] the statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטִֽים׃ <WH4941> and judgments

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I שֹׁלֵ֣חַ <WH7971> Behold I will send לָכֶ֔ם אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֵלִיָּ֣ה <WH452> you Elijah הַנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> the prophet לִפְנֵ֗י <WH6440> before בּ֚וֹא <WH935> the coming י֣וֹם <WH3117> day יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> of the great וְהַנּוֹרָֽא׃ <WH3372> and dreadful

וְהֵשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> And he shall turn לֵב־ <WH3820> the heart אָבוֹת֙ <WH1> of the fathers עַל־ <WH5921> unto בָּנִ֔ים <WH1121> to the children וְלֵ֥ב <WH3820> and the heart בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> of the children עַל־ <WH5921> unto אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <WH1> to their fathers פֶּן־ <WH6435> so אָב֕וֹא <WH935> lest I come וְהִכֵּיתִ֥י <WH5221> and smite אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the earth חֵֽרֶם׃ <WH2764> with a curse
